data.quote: Rich people have small TVs and big libraries, and poor people have small libraries and big TVs.
data.author: Zig Ziglar

data.quote: Too many people spend money they earned..to buy things they don’t want..to impress people that they don’t like.
data.author: Will Rogers

data.quote: It’s not how much money you make, but how much money you keep, how hard it works for you, and how many generations you keep it for.
data.author: Robert Kiyosaki

data.quote: Investing should be more like watching paint dry or watching grass grow. If you want excitement, take $800 and go to Las Vegas.
data.author: Paul Samuelson

data.quote: Time is more value than money. You can get more money, but you cannot get more time.
data.author: Jim Rohn

data.quote: I will tell you the secret to getting rich on Wall Street. You try to be greedy when others are fearful. And you try to be fearful when others are greedy.
data.author: Warren Buffet

data.quote: Money never made a man happy yet, nor will it. The more a man has, the more he wants. Instead of filling a vacuum, it makes one.
data.author: Benjamin Franklin

data.quote: Friendship is like money, easier made than kept.
data.author: Samuel Butler

data.quote: Rule No.1: Never lose money. Rule No.2: Never forget rule No.1.
data.author: Warren Buffet

data.quote: Money is only a tool. It will take you wherever you wish, but it will not replace you as the driver.
data.author: Ayn Rand
